summary: Finally, a use for all those Blades of Sacrifice you collect while on the Boethiah quest!
descriptionHtml:
Finally, a use for all those Blades of Sacrifice you collect while on the Boethiah quest!

This dagger is made using 1 Blade of Sacrifice and 2 human hearts, with Ebony Smithing. It is improved with 1 ebony ingot, with Arcane Blacksmith.

Base damage is 12, and it is enchanted with a drain health enchantment.

Enjoy!

EDIT:
I lowered the damage for those who said it was too overpowered. I hope you like this better!

The images are still from the other version. Just so you know.
author: KyreanNightblood
